hey i am trying the live cd for ppc: it loaded on 640x480 and i cant change it
and i dont know how to right click on the powerbook
command ctrl or alt click dont work
X, no ctrl-alt-(- or +) to switch?
usually, one maps keys with sysctl for right and middle clicking
I actually carry a mouse around with my powerbook, but let me get you some sysctl magic
if your powerbook is anything like mine,  echo -e 'dev.mac_hid.mouse_button_emulation=1\ndev.mac_hid.mouse_button2_keycode=96\ndev.mac_hid.mouse_button3_keycode=127'
save that to a file and sh it?
save to file and feed to sysctl, that should give you middle mouse button for the KP_enter key, next to your right command key
